47.eng-name: The Book Of Faith and its Signs

hadiths.text: Abu Sa'eed said:"I heard the Messenger of Allah [SAW] say: 'Whoever among you sees an evil, let him change it with his hand; if he cannot, then with his tongue; if he cannot, then with his heart- and that is the weakest of Faith

chapter.eng-name: Variation in People's Level of Faith
